title: The One That Got Away: She Wants To Reconnect With A Guy From 5th Grade?!
description:
Erin, a Bert Show listener, emailed us asking us to contact a guy she had a crush on in fifth grade. She’s 32 years old and has had her fair share of failed relationships. She recently ended things with her long-term boyfriend and thinks that now she is ready to start dating again.
She started thinking about all the guys she’s dated and even had a crush on at one point. During her thought process, she remembered having her first crush in the fifth grade.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
